name: E-Wallet login page with verification
description:
Hello everyone!

I present my version of the design of the login page with SMS authorization. 

This is a SaaS product an online wallet. The web application provides the ability to make online payments in various currencies, including cryptocurrency, and the ability to pay for goods in various online stores. I did a study of the digital wallet market and highlighted the main points that I included in this product and I described these benefits in the text that I posted on onboarding text on the login page. Based on the reviews of the wallet's users, I created a person who wants to choose the best option for himself and follows the path of the user, which is reflected in the CJM. To build a composition, I created a low fidelity wireframe and high fidelity wireframes for the screens. In the UI part of the design, I created components for auto layouts, as well as variants for displaying an interactive prototype in Figma and to simplify the future work on the design. The accent color I choose is blue because it symbolizes stability and is used for financial applications. I decided to use a readable and popular Poppins font and created a font styles for all design.

Thanks for a watching and have a nice day!
